mapper.update:
UPDATE data_match_event SET
data_match_event.MatchId = #{ matchId },
data_match_event.ClubType = #{ clubType },
data_match_event.ClubId = #{ clubId },
data_match_event.EventType = #{ eventType },
data_match_event.EventData = #{ eventData },
data_match_event.EventPoint = #{ eventPoint },
data_match_event.EventAt = #{ eventAt },
data_match_event.PlayerId = #{ playerId },
data_match_event.PlayerSecondaryId = #{ playerSecondaryId },
data_match_event.PlayerName = #{ playerName },
data_match_event.PlayerSecondaryName = #{ playerSecondaryName },
data_match_event.CreatedAt = #{ createdAt },
data_match_event.UpdatedAt = #{ updatedAt }
WHERE id= #{id}
